reference.title: DITA learning interaction base domain elements
reference.shortdesc: The learning interaction base 2 domain defines an "abstract" base type for all learning assessments. This element replaces the learning interaction base domain in DITA 1.2. This base type enables recognition of elements as interactions as distinct from other topic/div elements. The lcInteractionBase2 element is intended to be used only as a base for specialization. It should not be used directly as an element type in DITA documents.
